welcome_message_body: "Welcome to New Lenox, where Midwestern charm meets modern amenities. Known for its beautiful parks, quaint downtown area, and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all commercial flights and amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport is equipped to handle a wide range of air freight and shipping needs.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
